io.vertx.ext.web.api

Interface RequestParameter

  • Deprecated. 
    You should use the new module vertx-web-openapi

    @Deprecated
public interface RequestParameter
    Request parameter holder
    Author:
    Francesco Guardiani @slinkydeveloper
